settings.heading: Features
settings.richtext:
MORE ABOUT THE ELF BAR ELFA PODS 

Designed for use with the Elf Bar Elfa Pod Vape Kit, the Elf Bar Elfa pods are prefilled with 2ml of e-liquid as well as 20mg high-concentrate nicotine salts for a best in class, sensorial experience.

Nicotine salts absorb into the bloodstream faster than freebase nicotine, thus satisfying your nicotine cravings faster, and for longer. As well as this, you will receive consistent, strong yet smooth throat hits.

settings.title: Samie Deo
settings.text: The vape's aesthetics are top-notch. Its slim and stylish build not only looks sophisticated but also feels comfortable to hold. The attention to detail in its craftsmanship is truly commendable.
